song.englishname: Create in Me a Clean Heart [Live]

english.segment1: Create in me a clean heart. and purify me, purify me. Create in me a clean heart. so I may worship thee, everybody say it
english.segment2: chorus. Create in me a clean heart. and purify me(echox3). Create in me a clean heart. so I may worship thee
english.segment3: Say it now, say it now
english.segment4: chorus. Create in me a clean heart. and purify me(echox3). Create in me a clean heart. so I may worship thee
english.segment5: Cast me not away from thy presence. Please don't take your Spirit from me. and restore the joy of salvation. so that I may worship thee
english.segment7: chorus. Create in me a clean heart. and purify me(echox3). Create in me a clean heart. so I may worship thee
english.segment8: Cast me not away from thy presence. Please don't take your Spirit from me. and restore the joy of salvation. so that I may worship thee
english.segment9: chorusx2. Create in me a clean heart. and purify me(echox3). Create in me a clean heart. so that I may worship theex5(on second singing of chorus).
